entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:49 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 02:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
